Package com.koucha.experimentalgame

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controller
    Controller provide instructions to Character objects
    GameObject
    GameObjects can be added to a GameObjectList and will then be processed once per iteration of the game loop
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Instruction sent from a Controller to a Character
    Character
    Character.
    Game
    Main class backbone of the game, contains the game loop
    GameObjectList
    List containing GameObject objects
    HUD
    Heads up display Displays infos as an overlay over the game graphics
    Lwjgl3Test  
    PlayerController
    Receives mouse and keyboard input and generates instructions for the player Character
    SharedLibraryLoader
    Loads shared libraries from JAR files.
    Skill
    Represents a skill that can be used by Characters
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerController.Selector
    Associates actions to flags of a bit mask
    Skill.TargetType
    Different types of Targeting
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
